message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be a valuable asset to your business. I understand it's worth a significant amount to you, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  I'm offering it to you for $1,250,000. This price allows for a substantial profit for you while ensuring a fair return for me.  Consider this a one-time opportunity to acquire a product that can truly make a difference. Let me know your thoughts.
